Subject: Heritrix keeps ignoring my custom seeds?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=359501713

Hi

After programming my second custom fetcher module for fetching local files
I ran into a following (simple?) problem I cannot fix:

Heritrix keep ignoring my custom "localfile:/etc/issue" formatted seeds:

* it seems my fetcher plugin for Heritrix 1.4 never even sees the seeds
* I have edited heritrix.properties and added "localfile" as a supported
protocol
* I have removed PreconditionEnforcer etc. modules and using DecidingScope
with
  only one AcceptDecideRule
* My WHOIS-fetcher plugin seems to work ok with almost same settings.
* I'm using Heritrix v1.4.1


Any suggestions? And/or how Heritrix exactly makes the decision to ignore a
seed?



Thanks in advance,

--
Tomas Ukkonen
